required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Compare Fallopian Tube Cells Collected by Cytuity With Removed Ovarian/Tubal Tissue to Determine Presence of Malignancy
clinical_study.official_title: The nCYT Study: A Powered Study to Evaluate the Sensitivity and Specificity of Cytological Evaluation of Fallopian Tube Samples Collected by the Cytuity in Determining the Presence of Malignancy

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective, multi-center, non-randomized study to assess the ability of the Cytuity device to collect cell samples from the fallopian tube that can be evaluated for the presence or absence of malignancy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks after receiving pathology report from clinical site
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the cytological samples collected from the fallopian tube in determining the presence or absence of malignancy for fallopian tube involvement as compared to the surgical histology results.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Fallopian Tube Involvement
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks after receiving pathology report from clinical site
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries and fallopian tube for fallopian tube involvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Fallopian Tube
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks after receiving pathology report from clinical site
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the fallopian tube.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Ovaries
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks after receiving pathology report from clinical site
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries for epithelial malignancies.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Subject Level Analysis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks after receiving pathology report from clinical site
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology for fallopian tube involvement subject level analysis.

intervention.intervention_name: Hysteroscopic cell sampling of the fallopian tube

study_pop.textblock: Subjects who are scheduled to undergo a salpingo-oophorectomy or salpingectomy because of a pelvic mass suspicious for malignancy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Subject is medically cleared for surgery
2. Subject is scheduled to undergo salpingo-oophorectomy or salpingectomy for a pelvic mass suspicious for malignancy
3. Subject must be 18 years of age
4. Subject must be able to provide informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Contraindication to hysteroscopy
2. Acute pelvic inflammatory disease
3. Active or recent lower pelvic infection
4. Pregnancy
5. Delivery or termination of a pregnancy in the past 6 weeks
6. Known tubal obstruction
7. Tubal ligation
8. Invasive carcinoma of the cervix or endometrium
9. Intolerance of anesthesia

facility.name: Kaiser Permanente San Francisco Medical Center
